body_html:
Thanks @lantiga - hopefully I did it correctly :)

The tests seem to be failing now on unrelated tests from test_distributions.py - these appear to have been added very recently. Do you know if they're causing problems on other PRs?

EDIT: Looks like this is known and being addressed: #4351

body:
Thanks @lantiga - hopefully I did it correctly :)  

The tests seem to be failing now on unrelated tests from `test_distributions.py` - these appear to have been added very recently.  Do you know if they're causing problems on other PRs?

EDIT: Looks like this is known and being addressed: [#4351](https://github.com/pytorch/pytorch/pull/4351)
